comment: Lemma for ~ line2x . This proof is based on counterexamples for the following cases: 1. ` M =/= ( C / B ) ` : p = (0,C/B) (LHS of bicondional is true, RHS is false); 2. ` A =/= 0 /\ M = ( C / B ) ` : p = (1,C/B) (LHS of bicondional is false, RHS is true). (Contributed by AV, 4-Feb-2023.)
